diff_hunk:
@@ -3855,6 +3855,11 @@ def _compatibility_test(sequences, lengths, batch_first):
         self.assertEqual(packed.batch_sizes, [3, 2, 1])
         self.assertEqual(packed.data.data, expected)

body: This test is insufficient. It would have also passed even if you didn't pass `batch_first=True`. The best example is one that behaves differently depending on `batch_first`.
